titles.title: Out of the depths do I cry unto You;

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
But there is forgiveness with You
And You will I fear.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
More that the watchmen who wait for the dawn,
I will look for You,
My soul waits for You, O Lord,
In Your word do I hope,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For there is forgiveness with You
And You will I fear.
